mapper.insert: insert into store_file (file_id, file_name, file_url, file_upload_time, file_type, file_hash_code, file_download_count) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileHashCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDownloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update store_file set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_upload_time = #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_hash_code = #{fileHashCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_download_count = #{fileDownloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select file_id, file_name, file_url, file_upload_time, file_type, file_hash_code, file_download_count from store_file where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select file_id, file_name, file_url, file_upload_time, file_type, file_hash_code, file_download_count from store_file
